titles.title: A bill to provide tax relief for the victims of Hurricane Florence, Hurricane Michael, and certain California wildfires.
Hurricanes Florence and Michael and California Wildfire Tax Relief Act
Hurricanes Florence and Michael and California Wildfire Tax Relief Act
Hurricanes Florence and Michael and California Wildfire Tax Relief Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Hurricanes Florence and Michael and California Wildfire Tax Relief Act
This bill allows various tax credits, tax deductions, and modifications to existing tax rules for individuals and businesses affected by Hurricane Florence, Hurricane Michael, and wildfires in California.
